description: This file defines the 'Response' class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, representing a JSON-RPC response message for WebSocket communication. It declares methods for accessing response identifiers, checking response types (result or error), and retrieving detailed response data.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC response message, providing methods to access response IDs, determine if the response is a result or error, and retrieve associated data.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the Response object.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if the response is a result type.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result data into the provided JsonObject.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the response indicates an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error data into the provided JsonObject.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Verifies if the response message is valid.
